sentences.en: Dorothea let out a histrionic groan.
sentences.cn: 多罗西亚发出了一声做作的呻吟。

sentences.en: Fortune or misfortune, I feel this world is full of histrionic.
sentences.cn: 无论幸运或不幸时, 我都觉得这世界充满了戏剧性.

sentences.en: Garbo's natural manner distinguished her from more histrionic silent actors.
sentences.cn: 嘉宝自然的气质使她在众多的无声电影演员中脱颖而出.

sentences.en: He enunciated, quietly, but in something like his usual modulated and faintly histrionic tone.
sentences.cn: 他清晰地说, 虽然是轻声的, 却依旧是他平时那种抑扬有致,微微带些戏剧性的声调.

sentences.en: She had never forgotten her one histrionic achievement in Chicago.
sentences.cn: 她从未忘记过她在芝加哥的那一次成功的演出.

sentences.en: The core symptom of histrionic personality disorder is attracting other's attention.
sentences.cn: 表演型人格障碍的核心症状是寻求关注.

sentences.en: The improvement of parents'breeding model can prevent histrionic personality disorder.
sentences.cn: 改善父母的养育方式可以预防表演型人格障碍.
